title.rendered: A Three Day Women’s Retreat – Freeing the HeartMind

content.rendered:
PreviousNext
123456

A THREE DAY WOMEN’S RETREAT

FREEING THE HEARTMIND

SILENT MEDITATION

CREATIVE DHARMA PRACTICE

WITH JUDE BADERLE AND LISA BROWN

17 to 19 March, 2023

Yarrawarra Aboriginal Cultural Centre

The foundation of this retreat is based on the teachings of the Buddha. Lisa and I bring an eclectic and creative approach to facilitating retreats. We especially enjoy teaching for women, as there is something unique and special that is created when we come together. Women who have previously attended have found the retreats provided relief from the demands of their daily life, found stillness and gained a deeper understanding of their heart-mind.  The nourishing environment and company of other women has allowed for the teachings to land in a potent and insightful way.

This silent meditation retreat is suitable for beginner and experienced meditators. The retreat will begin with yoga in the morning, followed by meditation instructions, guided and silent sittings, walking meditation and dharma talks.

Included in the cost is simple accommodation, 3 vegetarian meals, tea and coffee.

As the accommodation fills up fairly quickly we would encourage you to book soon. We have a very limited number of single rooms and some share rooms. We encourage camping as there is lots of space for large tents and vans, you are welcome to use the bathroom facilities within the retreat building.

Please email Jude at jbaderle@bigpond.net.au for registration and more information.
